subsection.name: General
subsection.p: This addon is preconfigured and should work out of the box upon installation.

subsection.name: Archive manager
subsection.p: The most important configuration is about selecting the Web Archive manager to be used. This is governed by dependency management in your pom, please see install page.

subsection.name: Manager Parameters
subsection.p: Depending on the manager used, different parameters will be exposed. The configuration can be found under /hippo:configuration/hippo:modules/web-archiving-addon-services-daemon/archivemanager
